participant_abstract.sent: In the meeting we discussed the product that we are meant to design.
We are designing a universal remote control.

We have decided that the remote will need to be relativly small, ergonomic, flashy (the fashion element), battery operated, compatible will all types of entertainment equipment and above all have a user friendly guide.
The price should be 25 Euro but it must be manufactured for 12.50 or less.
As Industrial Designer it will be my responsibility to find materials and a good design for our product to ensure that if fulfillls all these requirements.

participant_actions.sent: Next meeting will be about functional design - I need to consider how to design the product in a way that will be functional?

participant_problems.sent: Meeting went quickly and well, perhaps too quickly?
No discussion on materials to be used.
